description:
Have you taken online courses but aren't sure how to write qualifications with impact? Done freelance gigs but uncertain about updating your resume/CV? Do you want to build better qualifications than your peers and talk about them in a way that will achieve professional results? 

If yes, this course is for you. We have noticed that people aren't writing qualifications in an impactful way... in a way that resonates with employers. It's easier than ever to get the qualifications but now we need to communicate them so you can get the career advancement you deserve. 

We will discuss all the modern methods of obtaining new qualifications and then go method by method, subject by subject, skill by skill; with ideas and examples of how best to communicate your qualifications. 

There is no course like this on the internet! This is your chance to bolster your career in ways that few else are doing. We look forward to working with you on your professional improvement in 2016!
title: Writing Top Qualifications - Online Ed, Freelancing, & More
